title: Standard Forms — SOP and POS
description: Assess your understanding of the standard forms used to express Boolean logic: Sum of Products (SOP) and Product of Sums (POS).

questions.question: What does SOP stand for in Boolean algebra?
What is the general structure of a SOP expression?
options: A combination of NOT and XOR
